packagecontents: One CBA550 Adapter with embedded 150M LTE modem
Two universal LTE antennas with SMA direct attach
insertSim:
Insert an Activated SIM

  1. Slide the SIM door cover to the left to reveal the SIM slots.
  1. Insert the SIM into the slot marked SIM-1 with the metal contacts up and notch in. It will click into place. Depress the SIM card to remove it.
  1. Use SIM-2 for secondary/backup SIM.



 

  1. Slide the SIM door cover to the right to cover the SIM slots.
  1. Insert the screw into the closed SIM cover and tighten.
attachAnttena:
Attach the Antennas

  1. Attach the two cellular modem antennas to the connectors.
  1. Hold the antenna straight and twist the base of the antenna to connect to the device.
  1. Do not over-tighten. The maximum recommended torque is 4 in-lbs.
  1. Angle the antennas for optimal signal reception.
poweron:
Connect the Power Source

  1. The CBA550 is powered a PoE-enabled RJ45 cable.

  2. Connect LAN port to PoE enabled networking equipment to Passthrough 3G/4G Internet to Ethernet and receive power.

    NOTE: If the router does not support PoE or does not have a PoE capable port, use a PoE injector optional accessory between the CBA550 and the router for power.
